description: Denmark moved fast to contain the outbreak and is now allowing small businesses to resume trade.
title: Coronavirus: Denmark to reopen hairdressers as it loosens lockdown
title_page: Coronavirus: Denmark to reopen hairdressers as it loosens lockdown - BBC News
maintext: The courts will reopen on 27 April. Cafes, restaurants and schools for ages 12 and over will not. Those who are allowed to go back to work but feel the time is not yet right will still be allowed to claim government compensation.
